categories: Category:Return of the Jedi radio drama voice actors

nodes.text: Natalia Nogulich (born October 1, 1950) is an American actress who voiced Mon Mothma in the Return of the Jedi Radio Drama.

Among her other noted roles, Nogulich played Vice Admiral Alynna Nechayev in four episodes of Star Trek: The Next Generation and two episodes of Star Trek: Deep Space Nine, and has also appeared on episodes of series such as 24, Bones and The West Wing.
